code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import{Dialog,DialogTitle,DialogContent,DialogActions,Button,Chip,Box,Typography,CircularProgress}from"@mui/material";import axios from"axios";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const InterestsSelector=_ref=>{let{open,onClose,currentInterests=[],onSave}=_ref;const[interests,setInterests]=useState([]);const[selectedInterests,setSelectedInterests]=useState(currentInterests);const[loading,setLoading]=useState(true);const[error,setError]=useState("");useEffect(()=>{const fetchInterests=async()=>{try{const response=await axios.get("/api/interests");setInterests(response.data);}catch(err){setError("Failed to load interests");}finally{setLoading(false);}};fetchInterests();},[]);const handleToggle=interest=>{setSelectedInterests(prev=>prev.includes(interest)?prev.filter(i=>i!==interest):[...prev,interest]);};const handleSave=()=>{onSave(selectedInterests);onClose();};if(loading){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(CircularProgress,{});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Dialog,{open:open,onClose:onClose,maxWidth:"sm",fullWidth:true,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogTitle,{children:"Select Your Interests"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(DialogContent,{children:error?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{color:"error",children:error}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Box,{sx:{display:"flex",flexWrap:"wrap",gap:1,mt:2},children:interests.map(interest=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Chip,{label:interest,onClick:()=>handleToggle(interest),color:selectedInterests.includes(interest)?"primary":"default",clickable:true},interest))})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(DialogActions,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:onClose,children:"Cancel"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{onClick:handleSave,variant:"contained",color:"primary",children:"Save"})]})]});};export default InterestsSelector;
